Subject: Epstein - Additional Requests/ Interviews 
We just spoke with OCME, and they would like (i) the responding ambulance reports; and (ii) physical descriptions (height 
and weight) for. Could you please get us this information? 
Second, below are the people that we would like to set up voluntary interviews with in the next few days. can you 
please reach out to to set these up: 
Thanks, 
Position Shift
